system.description:
You have unlocked further insights into how to use your bonded artifact and eldritch power together. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your warlock levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uqbgyebyrsx4azr1]{Extra Attack} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iq8cqiia40rs54os]{Spellsword} features.
  • Half your wielder levels count as warlock levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.0q5qeigzy5bv2zrq]{Extra Blast} feature.
